resources.string: Are you sure you want to leave?
Select the dimensions of your board.\nThe size must be between 10 and 30, and the number of colors between 2 and 6.
The controls at the bottom allow you to "flood" a group of identically colored cells, starting from the cell at the upper right corner.

Your goal is to fill the entire board with one color. You will be scored at the end- the less moves you make, the higher the score will be. There is no time limit, nor is time counted in the calculation of your final score. However, there is a limit for the amount of moves that you can make. The limit is calculated like so: (SIZE*COLORS)/4, as can be seen in the source code.

The default name can be found and changed at the settings screen. However, after each successful game, you will be given the option to use a different name. The default name is there for the sake of ease of use, to avoid forcing players to write their names after each game.
Your score will only be shown if it is amongst the top 10. Clicking a score will take you to the board in which the score was achieved, if you fancy beating a rival in their own board.
Are you sure you want to reset all scores and preferences? THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE!
